FlaggedPost.title: Flagged Post
FlaggedPost.description: Represents a piece of content that has been flagged for review.

content.description: The full text content of the post.

userId.description: The ID of the user who created the post.

userName.description: The name of the user who created the post.

userAvatar.description: URL to the user's avatar image.

date.description: The date and time the post was created.

category.description: The category assigned by the hate speech model.

confidence.description: The confidence score from the model (0-1).

source.description: The platform where the content originated (e.g., 'Facebook').

region.description: The geographical region associated with the post.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Stores information about a monitored user.

avatarUrl.description: URL to the user's avatar image.

profileUrl.description: URL to the user's social media profile.

lastActivity.description: The timestamp of the user's last known activity.

riskLevel.description: The assessed risk level of the user.

/flagged_posts/{postId}.description: Stores individual posts that have been flagged by the system.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores profiles of users who are being monitored.
